content: विवृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To turn round, roll, revolve, move round; <ls>Māl. 1. 40.</ls> {@--2@} To turn or move about. {@--3@} To turn aside, bend; कश्चिद्विवृत्तत्रिकभिन्नहारः <ls>R. 6. 16</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 12.</ls> {@--4@} To become. {@--5@} To turn away from, depart from, return. {@--6@} To descend. {@--7@} To attack, fall upon.
